    1: from __future__ import annotations
    2: 
    3: from virtualenv.activation.via_template import ViaTemplateActivator
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class CShellActivator(ViaTemplateActivator):
    7:     @classmethod
    8:     def supports(cls, interpreter):
    9:         return interpreter.os != "nt"
   10: 
   11:     def templates(self):
   12:         yield "activate.csh"
   13: 
   14: 
   15: __all__ = [
   16:     "CShellActivator",
   17: ]
